# hpegl_vmaas_cloud (Data Source)

Get the Cloud details

## Example Usage

```terraform
#  (C) Copyright 2021 Hewlett Packard Enterprise Development LP

data "hpegl_vmaas_cloud" "cloud" {
  name = "HPE GreenLake VMaaS Cloud"
}
```
